headline: YouTube captures 11.6% of TV viewing in February, Nielsen says
summary: According to Nielsen’s February 2025 Media Distributor Gauge: “YouTube (GOOG) took the lead in Nielsen’s February 2025 Media Distributor Gauge, gaining 2% over January to capture 11.6% of time spent watching TV across the month. This marks YouTube’s best share of TV to date, and is the second time the pure-play streamer has topped the Media Distributor Gauge since Nielsen began tracking in November 2023. YouTube has exhibited steady usage increases for some time. A longer-term look at the platfo

headline: New ‘Yellowstone’ Spinoffs Stoke Feud Between Paramount and NBCUniversal
summary: The entertainment companies have sparred over whose streaming service has the rights to air shows based on the hit western show.

raw.headline: New ‘Yellowstone’ Spinoffs Stoke Feud Between Paramount and NBCUniversal
raw.summary: The entertainment companies have sparred over whose streaming service has the rights to air shows based on the hit western show.

headline: Live-action 'Scooby-Doo' series coming to Netflix from Arrowverse, 'Riverdale' producers
summary: Netflix announced Wednesday it has ordered a live-action Scooby-Doo series. No casting or release date was set but the streaming service ordered eight episodes.The modern-day origin story will tell...

headline: Is Netflix Stock A Buy Ahead Of First-Quarter Earnings Report?
summary: Netflix stock is taking a victory lap after winning the streaming video war. Shares of the internet television network are near record high territory.

raw.headline: Is Netflix Stock A Buy Ahead Of First-Quarter Earnings Report?
raw.summary: Netflix stock is taking a victory lap after winning the streaming video war. Shares of the internet television network are near record high territory.
